title: Technical Support fluent in English and Polish
System Integration Specialist
description:
|  THE EXPERIENCE MATTERS  
  
C3i Healthcare Connections, a division of Telerx, is an American, company,
leading provider of technical support services for life sciences companies
worldwide. We operate in the field of Information technologies (IT) and their
application for the needs of the Pharmaceutical industry and clinical research
organizations. Since we had opened the office in Sofia, Bulgaria in 2005, we
managed to attract many talented and motivated people and helped them develop
their potential.  
  
To ensure the expansion of our Operations Center in Sofia, Bulgaria we are now
looking to recruit a System Integration Specialist.  
  
The SYSTEM INTEGRATION SPECIALIST will provide technical and investigational
support to customers experiencing issues with systems integrated in landscape
environment. The role will partner with Business Counterparts to facilitate
issue resolution, and utilize all technical resources available while adhering
to strict quality standards and regulatory requirements.  
  
Main responsibilities:  
• Provide professional and timely support to customers with reported various
technical issues  
• Identify root causes of the reported issues through analysis of log files,
database tables and server activities;  
• Identify miscommunication between systems in the landscape and supportive
modules of Integrated Drug Supply systems;  
• Act as a first escalation point to C3i Tier I Helpdesk, Supply Super Users
and Admin Applications teams for incidents in scope, identify and examine
trends in escalated cases and incidents;  
• Escalate and regularly monitor advanced customer issues to the respective
Third party escalation teams;  
• Prepare ad-hoc and regular reporting upon Client request or upon Helpdesk
Management request;  
• Identify and recommend opportunities to improve and enhance technical
processes;  
• Participate in special projects, client events and visits, as outlined by
management.  
  
Job requirements:  
• Fluency in English  
• Preferred university education, or at least 3rd year student, in the field
of Information technology, Informatics, Computer systems and technologies or
relevant certification  
• Experience in user support, application support, application development or
related areas  
• Knowledge of:  
\- security access concept, security systems, cryptographic certificates and
software frameworks such as but not limited to: PKI, TLS, HTTPS, WAF  
\- XML markup language.  
\- SQLPLUS utility and/or Oracle Queue middleware will be considered a strong
advantage  
• Experience supporting applications and/or Knowledge of clinical trial
systems and data collection methods will be a plus  
• Excellent communication and problem solving skills  
• Availability to work on shifts  
  
What we offer:  
• Professional on-boarding and on-going trainings  
• Opportunity to practice your foreign language skills and develop your
technical expertise  
• Opportunity for career progression with a leading US Company  
• Competitive salary and performance bonuses  
• Social benefits package  
• Possibility to combine work and study  
• Vibrant environment  
  
Are you willing to build up your career with us? - We’ll be happy to receive
your resume in English!  
  
*Your personal data is secure with us.  
** Only candidates selected for interview will be contacted

title: QA Engineer
description:
|  Playtech is a leading software provider for online gaming operators and can
be positively considered as one of the pioneers of the worldwide online and
land-based gaming industry. Company's business portfolio consists of the most
prominent names in the business, including Bet365, William Hill, Paddypower,
Gala, Coral, Betclic, Winner, Betfair, Poker770, etc. Behind the eminent
success of Playtech's products and services there are around 5,000 people
located in 13 countries, the majority of whom are engaged in research and
development of current and future gaming technologies.  
  
If you are creative, “out of box thinker”, youthful in your mind and ambitious
enough to make a difference in such a large scale international business, you
are more than welcome to apply for one of our open positions.  
  
  
  
  
** Job Description:**  

  * Taking part in QA processes, reading and analysis of requirements, implementation of test plans, testing of a new product
  * Ensuring the overall quality of the product; functional and non-functional testing
  * Data collection and working closely with developers and designers
  * Automation of test cases using Sikuli

  
  
** Requirements:**

  * Good knowledge of software Testing methodologies and procedures
  * Good knowledge of development standards and testing tools
  * Basic understanding of OOP principles, DB theory, algorithms
  * Experience in testing methodologies and tools 
  * Good command of English language (spoken and written)

  
  
** We Offer:**   

  * Friendly environment in a team of highly skilled and motivated young people
  * Personal and professional development and unlimited growth opportunities
  * Work on interesting projects in a leading multinational company
  * Excellent remuneration and benefits package (additional medical insurance, food vouchers, free snacks and beverages, bonuses, etc.)
  * Flexible working time and fresh atmosphere 
  * Trainings and regular team-buildings 

  
  
Please, send your CV in English!

title: Software Support Specialist with Arabic and English
description:
|  We are a global IT service provider supplying technical services to top
500+ companies around the world. With clients across the world we’re proud to
be highly recognized for our commitment to providing exceptional technical
expertise and customer care. There are 1200+ professionals working in
different IT areas at Tek Expert. We have centers in Malta, Costa Rica, China,
Vietnam, and Bulgaria.  
For our main office in Europe, located in Sofia we have the pleasure to invite
you to join our team as a:  
  
Software Support Specialist with Arabic and English  
  
Your role:  
  
The primary responsibility of the Support Engineer is to manage reactive
customer cases to a satisfactory resolution. The engineer has the full
responsibility of technical support to our customers. She/he will perform
suitable information gathering, troubleshooting and problem research,
collaborating with other engineers as necessary.  
  
Our requirements:  
  
• Fluency in Arabic and English  
• Experience with Linux, Windows, Windows server, Databases  
• Troubleshooting and problem solving skills  
• Proficiency with MS Office  
• IT Industry experience  
• Customer Support and/or Account Management experience  
• Degree in a technical/ scientific discipline would be an advantage  
  
*Please note, knowledge of both languages Arabic and English is required.  
  
We offer:  
  
Professional and personal growth through learning and development
opportunities  
Fast-track career in a continuously growing company with strong promote- from-
within culture  
Dynamic, friendly, energetic and fast-pace environment  
Great team of talented colleagues and responsive managers willing to support,
guide, and coach you  
  
If you are motivated for this opportunity and you believe you have the skills
and knowledge required for this role, please send us your resume in English.
All documents will be treated in the strictest confidentiality.  
  
Only short-listed candidates will be contacted.

title: Quality Assurance Software Engineer
description:
|  Opencode Systems is a telecommunications solution provider, dedicated to
open systems for All-G and Telco-over-Cloud mobile networks. Our specialized
core network technology is invisible to consumers but underlies many of the
mobile services they use.  
Opencode real-time core network products include Multi-Channel Network Browser
& Studio, iSDP (IMS Service Delivery Platform), Network Services Broker,
Core Messaging Suite, Carrier App Browser and other first-to-market
specialized solutions. Over 60 active mobile operators in more than 40
countries worldwide rely 24/7 on Opencode core network platforms. Opencode
patented, game-changing, network- and cloud-driven virtualized technology is
the preferred choice for the open and creative mobile network.  
  
Due to expanding its activities the company is looking for an experienced
Quality Assurance Software Engineer  
  
Main Responsibilities:  
• Analysis of the customer requirements and identification of potential gaps  
• Preparation and execution of test books and test cases  
• Testing services for correctness based on the specifications agreed with the
client  
• Checking compliance of the service documentation  
• Analysis of clients' reported software bugs and identifying the root cause
of the reported issues  
• Develop and implement moderately complex test plans and test cases  
• Participate in special or customer-specific projects as assigned and
implement Quality Assurance efforts  
• Propose improvements  
• Report to QA team leader  
• Report to Country Manager  
• Work closely with the customer for identifying and resolving service gaps  
  
Requirements:  
• Education in Computer Science and Informatics or related  
• Good knowledge in Quality Assurance and Control  
• Understanding of DB theory, algorithms, etc.  
• Good knowledge of English (spoken and written)  
• Knowledge in programming language  
• Experience in Linux/Unix environment  
• Knowledge of basic shell scripting  
  
  
Advantages:  
• Ability to be productive and handle multiple tasks to meet deadlines in a
dynamic environment  
• Software testing technology  
• Experience in telecommunication field  
• Experience in PHP/JS/other scripting language  
  
Company offers:  
• Challenging and dynamic international work environment  
• Opportunities for career growth  
• Company training  
• Competitive remuneration package  
• Young united team, consisting of very good specialists  
  
Do you want to work with multinational mobile operators & leading industry
experts?  
Please send your CV (in English).

title: Системен администратор
description:
|  Максима България ЕООД е представител на литовската компания Maxima Grupe
UAB – най-големия инвеститор в Литва, Латвия и Естония. В нейните структури
работят над 25 000 служители. Компанията оперира на българския пазар, като
собственик на веригата магазини Т-Маркет и Т-Маркет Експрес, с 61 супермаркета
в цялата стрaна.  
  
Във връзка с разрастване на дейността, търсим:  
  
СИСТЕМЕН АДМИНИСТРАТОР в офис София  
  
ОТГОВОРНОСТИ:  
\- Инсталиране, конфигуриране и мониторинг на мрежовото оборудване и сървърни
системи.  
\- Консултиране и поддържане на външно интегрирани финансови системи.  
\- Осъщестявяване на системен анализ и инсталиране на критични и security
patches и update на Windows сървъри и приложения на работните станции.  
\- Конфигуриране и поддръжка на helpdesk системи и системи за наблюдение на
мрежовата производителност и свързаност.  
\- Управление на потребителите и правата на достъп до информационните системи.  
\- Техническа поддръжка на различните потребители на Максима България.  
  
ИЗИСКВАНИЯ:  
\- Висше образование – Компютърни системи и технологии, Информационни
технологии, Информатика или друго подходящо за длъжността.  
\- Опит – не по-малко от 2 години. Опит придобит в търговски или логистични
компании ще се приеме за предимство.  
\- Отлично познаване на Windows операционни системи, умения за интеграция и
експлоатация на сървърни и комуникационни системи.  
\- Добро познаване на Linux операционни системи.  
\- Отговорност и прецизност при отстраняване на възникнали проблеми.  
\- Умения за работа в екип.  
\- Добри познания по английски език.  
\- Шофьорска книжка.  
  
ПРЕДЛАГАМЕ:  
\- Конкурентно възнаграждение;  
\- Индивидуално кариерно развитие;  
\- Участие в иновативни софтуерни проекти;  
\- Участие в различни програми за обучение и тренинг програми;  
\- Осигурен транспорт до работното място.  
  
Ако предложението представлява интерес за Вас, моля кандидатствайте по тази
обява, като изпратите своята професионална автобиография.

title: Senior Delivery Manager
description:
|  **Every day, people create amazing solutions at EPAM. Imagine, what you
could do!**  
  
Striving for excellence is in our DNA. Since 1993, we have been helping the
world’s leading companies imagine, design, engineer, and deliver software and
digital experiences that change the world. We are more than just specialists,
we are experts.  

Currently we are looking for a **Senior Delivery Manager **for our office to
make the team even stronger.

  
**Responsibilities:**  

  * Co-ordinate the preparation of customer proposals and statements of work
  * Participates in new business development
  * Deliver customer projects successfully
  * Manage customer expectations and relationship
  * Ensure that projects are delivered in line with EPAM process and methodologies
  * Address customer issues during an engagement in cooperation with the Account Manager
  * Make sure that the customer executes their responsibilities on the engagements
  * Identify and manage engagement risks and flag major issues early
  * Participate in overall project management, time estimation, and resource scheduling
  * Prepare engagement revenue and resource forecasts
  * Prepare engagement timesheets and billing information
  * Preparation of the weekly/monthly engagement reports
  * Prepare estimations on time frames, quality and quantity of resources required to successfully implement projects; develops project plan incorporating all project variables
  * Establish criteria concerning deliverability, performance, maintenance, design and costs
  * Assist in analyzing client processes through needs analysis and recommending new business models, workflows, or innovative solutions
  * Contribute to and manage engagement and process improvements
  * Suggest innovative solutions to business problems/processes that leverage technology to provide marketing differentiation, efficiency improvements, and better user experiences
  * Occasional mentoring of peers, including making sure that the offshore and onsite project team undertakes their duties effectively
  * Travel to client sites as needed
  * 

**Required skills and experience:**

  * **5-10 years’ experience working in consulting or outsourcing account/delivery management;**
  * Strong understanding of software development;
  * **5+ years' project management experience;**
  * Ability to establish solid working relationships with clients, plus the ability to work effectively as a virtual member of a dynamic, dispersed team and to meet deadlines;
  * Strong experience working with distributed teams on client side;
  * Excellent communication, presentation, and planning skills are necessary;
  * Expected to have exceptional organization, leadership and stakeholder management skills;
  * Self-motivated, multitasking, reliable to deliver on time, a quick-thinker, be able to work in a fast-paced work environment.
  * **Strong development experience with Java/C# or other software platform **
  * Knowledge in DevOps processes is advantage.
  * **Agile experience and/or knowledge **

  
**EPAM offers:**

  * Attractive salary, additional **health and dental insurance** as long as other **social benefits;**
  * **Personal development** program that will allow people to be valued for their**strengths;**
  * Wide range of **professional trainings** and workshops;
  * **Broad projects** variety and** possible mobility** between projects over the time;
  * **Experience exchange** with colleagues around the world;
  * **Work-life balance** and flexible schedule, team buildings and sport opportunities;
  * Modern office in the **Infinity Tower** business center. 

  

**About us:**

EPAM Systems is an **US based** software services and solutions provider
ranked **#1 in Central and Eastern Europe** with over 15 000 employees. From
software products to core business applications, EPAM has provided expert
consulting, development, testing, support and infrastructure services to many
of the world’s leading organizations. As the world of technology has evolved,
so has our distributed delivery model, which now includes advanced
capabilities in running **Agile and Lean engagements. **Recognized as a Leader
in Product Development in CEE - we have just opened our **office in Sofia**
and you have a unique chance to be a member of our Bulgarian team from the
very beginning. Join us now!

_  
If you are interested in this role please send your CV in English._

_All applications will be treated as strictly confidential._

_Only short-listed applicants will be contacted._

title: QA ENGINEER
description:
|

**DESCRIPTION  
**  
We are an international software company focused on mobile security, privacy
and end-to-end encryption. Our flagship products are the Android-based Secure
Phone and Secure Pack, as well as Secure BlackBerry.  
  
**Secure Group**, formerly DELATEK, is an international provider of solutions for secure mobile communications. As the name implies, we enable our customers to exchange sensitive information safely, protecting their business and personal life.  
  
We have built a name for our secure and user-friendly Secure Phone and Secure
BlackBerry smartphones, as well as Secure Pack — our suite of mobile
communication apps. Our products employ the best end-to-end encryption
technologies available.  
  
**OUR MISSION**  
  
Our ultimate mission is to ensure our customers’ cybersecurity and enable them
to communicate in full privacy without compromising neither protection, nor
user-friendliness.  
  
**OUR VISION**  
  
No great goal could ever be achieved without a great vision. To accomplish our
mission, we have committed to providing the best encrypted communication
products, services and solutions, and to educating people.  
  
**We're now hiring a QA Engineer at our main R&D center, located in Sofia, Bulgaria.**

**REQUIREMENTS**  

  * Relevant education
  * 2+ years of experience in software quality assurance
  * Experience with version control systems
  * Knowledge in HTML, CSS, JavaScript
  * Working level of English

_**It would be advantageous** if you have some knowledge or experience with:_  

  * Agile methodologies
  * At least some of the following: CasperJS, NodeJS, MySQL, Apache, Tableau, web analytics tools
  * Software test automation tools
  * Tools like Selenium, Jira, GIT, SoapUI

**BENEFITS  
**

  * Competitive** remuneration**
  * Excellent working** environment**
  * Spacious office with** entertainment** and** relaxation** areas
  * We'll invest in your education — company-paid** tech courses**
  * Extra** day off** for each year you work at the company
  * Company-sponsored **SportPass** cards for various sports activities
  * Private **health insurance**
  * Free** parking**
  * **Relocation** assistance
  * And more...

_If you think we might be a good match, send us your **CV in English** now!_

title: UNIX Capacity Specialist
company: Hewlett Packard Enterprise / Hewlett-Packard GDBC EOOD
description:
|  
Hewlett Packard Enterprise is an industry leading technology company that
enables customers to go further, faster. With the industry’s most
comprehensive portfolio, spanning the cloud to the data center to workplace
applications, our technology and services help customers around the world make
IT more efficient, more productive and more secure.  
  
The Capacity Specialist is responsible for applying detailed technical
capacity planning knowledge to the process. The Planner collates information
for all new or changed infrastructure, defines and requests expansion
requirements, estimates overall growth or reduction of user demand and
anticipates the effect of improvements in technology on overall component
demand. The candidate should possess a solid understanding of their technology
and be capable of making sound, informed judgements in a timely and accurate
manner. The Capacity Specialist would be working in a global environment
providing technical inputs that inform the optimum spend of an annual budget
in excess of $10m.  
  
The Capacity Planner is responsible for applying detailed technical Capacity
Planning knowledge to the process. This is a dynamic position, supporting the
Capacity Management team in a highly visible positon. This position will
functionally report to the Global Client Capability lead. The Planner
accumulates information for all new or changed infrastructures and defines
expansion requirements. Estimating overall growth or decrease of user demand
and anticipated improvements in technology on overall component demand is a
key responsibility for this role.  
  
  
Job specifics/responsibilities:  
  
  
• Produce capacity plans in line with business planning cycles; identifying
requirements early enough to accommodate procurement and approval lead times.  
• Document need for increases and reductions in hardware based on service
level requirements, targets and cost constraints.  
• Provide regular management reports which include current usage of resources,
trends and forecasts  
• Provide holistic management of capacity that includes people and processes
as well as technology  
• Oversee decisions and actions to utilize Demand Management for controlling
capacity when necessary  
• Ensure shortfalls in capacity are recognized and appropriate corrective
actions are identified and progressed on a timely basis  
• Create and maintain forward looking capacity forecasts to predict future
hardware/software spend  
• Provide regular reports on capacity to direct line management  
• Organize and maintain a regular capacity review process  
• Agree appropriate actions to maintain or improve capacity levels  
• Initiate and coordinate actions required to maintain or improve capacity
across appropriate IT units  
• Act as a coordination point for changes to capacity levels when needed  
  
  
  
Qualifications  
  
  
• Technical background (5+ years of experience desired) in Linux/ UNIX,
specifically Redhat 6.5, Solaris 2.9/8/9/10, SLES 8/9/10/11, AIX 5.x, 6.1, OEL
5.8 as well as Veritas RHEL, Veritas 4.x Solaris / AIX, Veritas 5.0 Solaris /
AIX, Veritas 5.1 Solaris / AIX  
• Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Business, or related
field or equivalent work experience.  
• Proven track record managing resources and business requirements.  
• Good arithmetic skills and experience or dealing with budgets, statistics
and forecasting models.  
• Fluent in written and verbal English  
  
This role provides the opportunity to learn about ITIL and capacity management
in detail and to grow from purely technical professional to a broader role
with global scope.  
  
We offer:  
  
• Great opportunity for professional development in the IT field  
• Extensive training program  
• Environment that stimulates achievements and excellent customer service  
• Part in a team that has established itself as a preferred partner for Hi-
tech Services & Support throughout EMEA  
• Competitive remuneration package  
• Medical insurance.  
• 4 days additional paid leave (total:24 days).  
• Food vouchers.  
• Opportunity to use free parking slots.  
• Life insurance.  
• Wellness program including company funded sport events and seminars.  
• HPE badge program including various discounts for products and services.  
• Work-life balance program including free legal, financial and psychological
consultations  
  
Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.  
  
This is to inform you that Hewlett Packard Enterprise GDBC EOOD (HPE) is
registered as an administrator of personal data to the Commission for Data
Protection. Some of the information that you provide voluntarily is personal
information and falls under the special protection regime under the Law on
Personal Data Protection. The personal data provided by you will be processed
for the purposes of the selection process as well as for the realization of
the legitimate interests of the data controller in respect of any future
contract of employment. HPE takes the responsibility to handle, use and store
your personal data, ensuring its protection in secret from the third parties.
We inform you and you agree that HPE may provide your personal data to
government, municipal institutions, banks, companies, corporate bodies and
individuals, where such obligation exists under a special legal provision,
where it is necessary for realization of your rights and legal interests as a
participant in the selection process, and when it is necessary to realize the
legitimate rights and interests of HPE. HPE can provide your personal
information to corporate bodies and individuals who are assigned to actions
and activities relating to the selection process and in respect of any future
contract of employment.

title: Linux Engineer with Finnish/Swedish or Spanish
description:
|  Established in 1986, Sutherland Global Services is a global BPO and
technology-enabled services company offering an integrated set of back-office
and customer facing front-office services that support the entire customer
lifecycle. It is one of the largest, independent BPO companies in the world
serving marquee clients in major industry verticals. Headquartered in
Rochester, New York, United States, Sutherland employs over 60,000
professionals and has nearly 60 global delivery centers.  
  
Opened in 2008 in Sofia, Sutherland Bulgaria is a multi-lingual customer
service hub and has since grown to more than 1300 employees in three different
sites, two in Sofia and one in Burgas which was opened in 2014. Our team of
professionals provides technical support and customer service in more than 16
European languages.  
  
Description of the Role  
  
We are looking for technical savvy to join one of our teams and start
providing technical support for one of the quick growing software as a service
companies.  
You will be responsible for troubleshooting problems in the field of software
functionality, application server setup, database management, data analysis,
operating system configuration, installation, migration and upgrades of an
e-learning product.  
  
Responsibilities:  
  
\- Manage resolution of complex application issues for a distinct set of
clients and also build high level of client trust  
\- Analyze customer problems to find the best technical solutions  
\- Takes part in implementation activities when needed  
\- Analyze trends associated with the assigned customer base and report
potential areas of risk or reward  
\- Able to prioritize tasks and to involve other teams when needed by
following the escalation pro-cedures  
\- Responsible also to document all cases and resolutions in order to create
good knowledge base  
  
Requirements:  
  
\- Very good command of English and Spanish/Finnish or Swedish language  
\- Technical, customer support, experience with enterprise software
applications  
\- Knowledge of Administration in at least one Server architecture (Windows,
Linux, Solaris)  
\- Knowledge of database administration principles in Oracle,
Sqlserver,PostgreSQL including trou-bleshooting, configuration and tuning  
\- Understanding of Internet application technologies including HTML, XML,
networking, firewalls, web server configurations and security  
\- Working knowledge of Java is preferred  
\- Attention to detail in handling and tracking technical issues  
-Team player with ability to prioritize   
  
Life at Sutherland:  
  
\- We offer competitive salary  
\- Excellent social benefits package including Health Insurance, Life
Insurance, Food vouchers, Compliment Cards, Transportation allowance  
\- Rewards and recognition programs  
\- Trainings following the leading global standards for highest quality of
Customer Service and Technical Support  
\- Structured working environment  
\- Career opportunities  
\- Great office location  
\- Team Building activities  
  
If you find this opportunity suitable for you and you want to develop your
career in a company which upholds highest industry standards, please send your
CV (in English).  
  
The information provided by you is personal and will be protected.  
Only the shortlisted candidates will be contacted.

title: Senior Big Data Dev Ops Engineer
description:
|  VMware is a global leader in cloud infrastructure and business mobility.
Built on VMware's industry-leading virtualization technology, our solutions
deliver a new model of IT that is fluid, instant and more secure. Customers
can innovate faster by rapidly developing, automatically delivering and more
safely consuming any application.  
  
With 2015 revenues of $6.6 billion, VMware has more than 500,000 customers,
more than 75,000 partners, and 19,000+ employees in 120+ locations around the
world. At the core of what we do are our people who deeply value execution,
passion, integrity, customers, and community. Do you dare to do the stuff
you've always dreamed about?  
  
VMware is looking for DevOps Engineers experienced with the continuous
delivery, operations and troubleshooting of a large scale distributed system.
We are looking for a person with great technical, interpersonal and
communication skills and passion for working with VMware products and state of
the art open source Big Data analytics solutions.  
  
Responsibilities:  
• Participate in the definition and improvement of the process to support a
robust and efficient continuous deployment of a Hadoop based analytics system  
• Participate in the automation of the continuous deployment process  
• Deploy and update various applications and platform components  
• Monitor and tune the availability, performance and resource allocation of
the system  
• Troubleshoot system issues reported by the monitoring system or customers  
• Efficiently interact with other R&D & IT organizations in order to
accomplish shared projects successfully  
  
Required:  
• Experience building and operating highly available and scalable
infrastructure solutions  
• Strong knowledge in Java or Python  
• Strong knowledge in Shell scripting  
• Hands on experience with Linux administration  
• Hands on experience with database technologies  
• Bachelor Degree in Computer Science or equivalent  
• Experience with Hadoop and related technologies (is a plus)  
  
Competencies:  
• Excelent verbal and written communication skills  
• Consistently take the appropriate actions to resolve problems of increasing
complexity  
• Seek active cooperation with others ensuring goal alignment with relevant
parties  
• Team player  
  
VMware offers:  
\- Attractive compensation package - competitive salary, flexible bonus
scheme, company sponsored mobile phone plan and additional long term
incentives  
\- Individual career path - management and technical career growth, enhanced
by learning and development program, regular performance assessment, teams of

title: SENIOR FULL STACK APPLICATION DEVELOPER
description:
|  Are you interested in cutting edge application development technologies?
Looking for an open, collaborative working environment with flexible work
hours and a diverse international culture? Want to challenge your coworkers to
a game of foosball on your lunch break, or perhaps join the office Photography
Club or Cooking Club? Infragistics offers all this and more - and we’re
hiring!  
  
Known as a worldwide leader in providing tools and solutions to accelerate
design, development and collaboration for any organization, Infragistics is
looking for a Senior Full Stack Application Developer to join our IS team
located in Sofia, Bulgaria. You will be responsible for technical design,
development, implementation and support of all tiers of our corporate websites
& portals, intranet web applications and services. As a senior member of
our team, you will be involved in planning projects, tasks and providing
guidance to team members.  
  
Responsibilities  
  
• Technical Design, Develop/Customize and Support  
\- Infragistics . com Site Content Management System Infrastructure, Business
layers and backend.  
\- All layers of our web portals: Forums, Blogs, ecommerce, Customer/Partner
Portals  
\- All layers of our CRM/ERP Internal Systems and intranet websites  
\- Integrations between third-party solutions and our websites/internal
systems  
• Collaborate with an international team of developers, UX/Visual designers,
business stake holders, leaders and managers to deliver these applications  
• Work with the team to arrive at the best-fit technology solutions  
• Ensure quality and use industry accepted best practices to implement designs  
• Write Wiki articles/document the technical design and implementation details  
• Provide guidance to other team members and own projects  
• Play a key role in defining standards for application development and source
management  
  
Qualifications  
  
Education/Technical Expertise  
• Bachelor degree in Information Systems, Computer Science, or similar field
(equivalent professional experience)  
• 5+ years of Application development experience with Microsoft.NET and
related technologies with strong knowledge of web application development  
• Experience in ASP.NET MVC, C#, JavaScript/jQuery, CSS, HTML/XHTML/HTML5,
Entity Framework, SQL  
• Experience in building web services/APIs  
• Familiarity with SCRUM/Agile software development methodologies  
• Any experience with Umbraco CMS, AngularJS, CRM/ERP solutions like Microsoft
Dynamics CRM/GP is a plus  
  
Characteristics  
  
• Ability and experience in completing all phases of software development  
• Flexibility to handle the dynamic needs of the organization/management  
• Ability to understand how the business functions and implement appropriate
technical solutions  
• High attention to detail and providing extreme importance to quality of the
deliverables  
• Ability to prioritize, multi-task, organize work and set clear expectations  
• Ability to work as a team member and independently with minimal supervision  
  
We Offer  
  
• Open, friendly, collaborative working environment with cutting edge
technologies  
• Learn and improve top-notch, commercial software development practices
through on-the-job experience and ongoing professional development programs  
• Work with many other skilled developers all over the world  
• Company-provided external and internal trainings (English course, UX
training; Microsoft certification, ISTQB certification)  
• Additional health insurance  
• Company-provided food & beverages program  
• Flexible working time  
• Office massages  
• Food vouchers  
• Sport and relaxing activities - xBox, table tennis, foosball, as well as
yoga and morning gymnastics in the office  
• Chance to express yourself - share your hobby with the team by setting up a
club, or join one of the existing ones – we already have a Book Club, Cooking
Club, Photography Club  
  
If your profile fits our requirements and you would like to be part of a
passionate group of creative professionals delivering great software to a
large worldwide customer base, please send us your resume!

title: WEBSITE MIGRATION SPECIALIST - SYSTEM ENGINEER
description:
|

**OVERVIEW**  
  
**Zertios LTD:**

Our startup was founded in 2014 managing the website migrations of a family of
web hosting companies in Belgium. Since then we have gradually expanded our
expertise. Currently Zertios is working as a micro-scale service centre for
tens of thousands of customers with more than 100 000 websites, providing
solutions for system monitoring, support, web development, digital marketing
and looking to add more…  
  
**The job:**  
We are expanding our Sofia team with two Web Migration Engineers that are
capable of handling complex semi-automated migrations of hundreds of websites
between hosting environments.

The team you will be a part of will evolve in time, going through three
distinct stages.

  * **In stage I **your primary focus is to integrate/migrate applications (websites) onto the company hosting cluster, resolving all issues stemming from differences between the environments.
  * **In stage II **you are responsible for developing new methods to migrate content minimizing the issues known from stage I. This will include writing scripts and developing tools that facilitate the process.
  * **In stage III**, you become a fully-functional part of a creative technical team that is responsible for all aspects of the technical hosting infrastructure within the company.

**The training:  
**We expect the applicants to have solid technical background we can step on. Zertios will offer you paid subject-specific training in our Sofia office for between 2 and 3 weeks.

Learning at Zertios is a continuous process. After you step into the position
you can expect to be encouraged and supported by the company to develop and
expand your knowledge through various channels.  
  
**The office:**  
After the end of the training the engineers will start work in the office, in
the very center of Sofia. Refreshments are on us!  
  
**REQUIRED SKILLS**

**IT skills:**

  * Profound understanding of the Linux Operating System.
  * Junior software development experience in PHP.
  * Understanding of open source projects like Joomla, Drupal, Magento, Wikis, OsCommerce, etc.
  * Demonstrable knowledge of web technologies including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, AJAX, etc.
  * Experience with relational databases like MySQL.
  * Be able to deploy code trough different protocols like SSH, FTP, GIT, etc.
  * Understanding of common internet protocols including DNS, IMAP, POP3, SMTP, HTTP.
  * Define and keep your deadlines

**Language skills:**

  * Very good verbal communication in English is a must.

**Personal skills:**

  * Reliable and loyal
  * Responsible
  * Flexible
  * Independent 
  * Self-improvement
  * Excellent communication skills
  * Efficient communication with different remote technical teams

**WHAT YOU WILL DO**

  * Website migrations
  * Database migrations
  * Server migrations
  * PHP scripts for automated migrations (from stage II on)
  * Development and maintenance of the hosting infrastructure (from stage III on)

**WHEN YOU WILL WORK**

The system engineers will have flexible working hours and should be willing to
take about 1 week per month of night work.

**WHAT WE DO FOR YOU**

  * Paid training
  * Competitive salary
  * Cool office location in the very center of Sofia
  * Free energy boost – tea, coffee, fresh fruit
  * Social benefits
  * Career future

_If you think you fit the profile, please do not hesitate to apply. We will be
glad to meet you in person!_

title: Директор на софтуерното поделение
UI/UX/Web Designer
description:
|  Ние мислим различно, работим нестандартно, имаме интересни и разнообразни
проекти. Търсим нов човек, който да се присъединим към ядрото на нашия екип.
Търсим човек, който харесва това, което прави и не се плаши от
предизвикателства. Водещото за тази позиция е усета към красивото и
креативността, както и възможността да излизате извън рамките на познатото.  
  
**В работата си държим изключително на крайния резултат и съумяваме да намерим време да изпипваме това, което правим. Ние вярваме, че за да остане креативен, човек трябва да има време да събира впечатления и идеи. За това позициите, които предлагаме са за 20 часова работна седмица, а не за 40 часова, както е прието на повечето места.**  
  
За да кандидатствате по тази позиция ни изпратете CV и портфолио с проекти, по
които сте работили до момента.  
  
Какви качества и умения търсим:  
• Различна гледна точка, интересни идеи и нестандартен подход  
• Безупречно владеене на Photoshop  
• Опитът с HTML5 и CSS3 е голям плюс  
• Работата с AfterEffects за дизайн на потребителските взаимодействия е голям
плюс  
• Опитът с Illustrator е плюс  
• Интереси в областта на UX и User Interaction Design, както и желание за
развитие в тази област  
• Интереси в областта на фотографията  
• Фокус към детайлите и желание за постигане на перфектен резултат във всичко  
  
Какво предлагаме :  
• Изключително разнообразни проекти  
• Възможност да приложите уменията си и да се развивате работейки със експерти
в уеб разработките, социалните медии, видео продукцията и пълния спектър на
съвременния дигитален маркетинг  
• Гъвкавост и разбиране по отношение на работното време  
• Среда в която може свободно да изразиш себе си

Currently, our IT recruitment team is engaged in identification of
**experienced JAVA developers** who will make next steps in their professional
development at the **world’s leading logistics company – DHL.**

** **

**DHL Freight is setting up an in-house Competence Centre (CC) in Sofia, Bulgaria. **Join the new team and fulfil your career ambitions. At DHL, you will be part of a strong team that respects its employees, society and the environment. You will **deal with people from all over the world** and get the chance to experience the **unique international spirit of DHL.**

The Competence Centre will serve the role of a **software integrator and a
development centre for the newly acquired TMS **(Transport Management System)
platform. This is an exciting opportunity to work on an innovative solution
which **will be implemented globally**. The role of the CC will cover the
activities from software development through software integration and global
deployment.

In DHL, you have a strong partner at your side to provide excellent career
opportunities globally. As the world’s leading logistics company, DHL
continuously encourage you to broaden your horizons and fulfil your potential
via a wide range of learning and development opportunities.

The **Application / TMS (Senior Java) Developer **designs the required
functionality in a way that the application continues to perform as requested
in a high volume environment. He uses the System Requirements Specification as
input to develop the code. He interacts with key users from the organisation
on a frequent way in order to verify if the designed solution meets
expectation of the organisation.

**_Requirements:_**

**_ _**

  * Bachelor /Master degree in Computer Science, Engineering or a related subject
  * Proven hands-on Software Development experience
  * Proven working experience in **Java** development – **at least 3 years**
  * Preferable experience with agile development methodologies
  * Hands on experience in designing and developing applications using **Java EE platforms**
  * Object Oriented analysis and design using common design patterns
  * Profound insight **of Java, Jasper and JEE internals (Classloading, Memory Management, Transaction management etc.)**
  * Excellent knowledge of Relational Databases, SQL and ORM technologies (JPA2, Hibernate)
  * Preferable knowledge of- and experience with Oracle DBs
  * Experience in developing web applications using at least one popular web framework (JSF, Wicket, GWT, Spring MVC)
  * Experience with test-driven development
  * Willingness to travel (up to 40%)

**_Responsibilities: _**

**_ _**

  * Design and develop high-volume, low-latency applications for mission-critical systems, delivering high-availability and performance
  * Contribute in all phases of the development lifecycle
  * Write well designed, testable, efficient code
  * Ensure designs are in compliance with specifications
  * Prepare and produce releases of software components
  * Support continuous improvement by investigating alternatives and technologies and presenting these for architectural review
  * Team-player’s attitude

**Working at DHL means taking responsibility, mastering challenges and continuously growing as part of a diverse and global team.**

** **

All applications will be treated strictly confidential. Only short-listed
candidates will be contacted.

title: SENIOR INFRASTRUCTURE ANALYST
description:
|

If you join Javelin Group part of Accenture Strategy you can make great ideas
happen for some of the world's most dynamic companies. With broad global
resources and deep technical know-how, we collaborate with clients to
cultivate ideas and deliver results. Choose a career at Javelin Group part of
Accenture Strategy and enjoy an innovative environment where challenging and
interesting work is part of daily life. We need people who can challenge
conventional wisdom, offer unique perspectives and conceive more innovative
solutions for our business.  
  
**DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES**

  * Use automation to deploy application and configuration
  * Manage monitoring toolset and developing as appropriate
  * Liaise with third party hosting companies to ensure regular maintenance including patching within agreed timelines
  * Building infrastructure as required by projects, including application database servers
  * Liaising with third parties to deliver solutions on time and to budget
  * Provide input to customer reports and presentations
  * Commitment to supporting a highly-available solution; attention to details, quality and response time
  * Ensure solution documentation is accurately maintained
  * You will be responsible of new and ongoing projects.
  * Mentor and develop technical support team members
  * Deputies for Lead Infrastructure in his absence

**EXPERIENCE & KNOWLEDGE**

**Essential**

  * Puppet
  * Redhat, Debian, any other Linux flavour is a plus
  * Tomcat/Java with troubleshooting experience and very good understanding
  * Scripting bash/perl
  * An understanding of networks - routing/switching, firewall, load balancing, VPN - (Vendor agnostic)
  * Apache, load balancing, high availability, clustering, apache modules
  * Mysql, configuration tuning, replication, clustering and high performance
  * Security

**Desirable**

  * Amazon Web Services (AWS), MS Azure
  * Monitoring tools
  * Docker
  * Adobe AEM
  * Windows server administration (IIS, MSSQL, powershell)

**SKILLS & ATTRIBUTES**  

  * Extremely motivated and enthusiastic
  * Proactive and self-starter
  * Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written
  * Will be confident, articulate and literate, presenting him/herself as a professional at all times
  * Self-motivated, disciplined, able to work on own initiative and take responsibility for own work
  * Committed to the achievement of excellence
  * Constantly strive to discover and learn new technologies
  * Ability to balance client business priorities with technical requirements
  * Resilient and able to work in an organisation that is undergoing change due to growth
  * Ability to work on multiple projects in parallel
  * Team player

**EDUCATION & QUALIFICATION**  

  * Computer related degree Certifications will be strongly considered

title: Migration Engagement Lead
company: Hewlett Packard Enterprise / Hewlett-Packard GDBC EOOD
description:
|  
Global Engineering & Technical Consulting (GE&TC) is an organization
within Hewlett Packard Enterprise which delivers pre-sales, consulting and
engineering services for the Enterprise Services customers in HPE. GE&TC
takes accountability for infrastructure design and build, develops
architecture, strategy and roadmaps, performs IT workload migration and leads
infrastructure deployments  
  
•Manages the migration design/planning and oversees execution, ensuring that
all data required to plan/execute the migration is collected, validated, and
updated in the SSoT (Single-Source-of-Truth) data repository to ensure all
data is 3C-data (correct, current, complete) for all Source workloads
(apps/servers) at all times; all move-groups, workload placement, migration
methods, and migration tools are selected correctly; and all technical
resources are engaged and tasked for execution  
•Ensures WAME (Workload Assessment & Migration Engine) capabilities and
best-practices are used to optimize the migration of workload  
•Identifies changes/additions to Source environment, and triggers scope-
change-control when/where necessary  
•Ensures prerequisites are in-place, test-plans are in-place (technical &
UAT), technical resources are available, and technical escalation paths are
in-place for successful migration waves  
•Triggers and manages technical escalations to ensure the right technical
resources are brought-to-bear to resolve issues during the window  
•Ensures workload migration occurs on-scope, on-schedule, on-budget, on-
quality and manages client/account communications as related to the migration

Requirements:  
  
•Meets degree educational requirements or has equivalent work experience for
job code.  
•5+ years’ experience related to datacenter migrations  
•Demonstrates strong communication skills (written and oral)

across regions and time zones

•Proven ability to work in cross-cultural environments  
•Prior experience with application or infrastructure development projects  
•Ability to manage projects within scope of responsibility.  
•Ability to interact with customers regarding business and technical
information  
•Demonstrates strong team building skills - ability to work as a team

•MS SharePoint, MS Project

company: Hewlett Packard Enterprise / Hewlett-Packard GDBC EOOD
description:
|  HP Enterprise Services is the global business and information technology
services division of Hewlett-Packard. As one of the world’s leading services
organizations, serving more than 400 of the Fortune 500 companies and more
than 1,000 businesses and government agencies in 135 countries, we help
clients focus their IT investments to better engage with their customers,
manage risk, tackle the explosion of data, and transition to a new style of
IT.  
  
As one of our most senior technical experts you will combine your extensive
technical knowledge with your operational knowledge to manage some of the most
advanced technical solutions provided by HP and other market leading vendors.  
  
The role:  
• Manage in-depth server audits and assessments to proactively identify risks
in customers infrastructure, maintain and improve availability, performance
and security  
• Drive resolution and root cause analysis of the most business critical and
complex incidents and involvement in multiplatform technical emergency
response team  
• Provide technical expertise in UNIX/Linux based enterprise solutions to
internal and external parties  
  
  
Who are we looking for?  
• An expert with minimum 3 years of experience with configuration and
administration of enterprise Linux distributions (Red Hat Enterprise Linux
(RHEL), SuSE Linux Enterprise Server, Oracle Linux)  
• Experience with any of the following Enterprise UNIX operating systems: HP-
UX, AIX, Solaris  
• Experience in performance optimization and capacity management  
• Excellent knowledge of LVM and file systems (ext3, ext4, NFS, etc.)  
• Experience with any of the following: ZFS, UFS, XFS, VxFS, JFS  
• Experience with high-availability / cluster solutions like: HP Service
Guard, Red Hat Cluster, IBM PowerHA (HACMP), Oracle Solaris Cluster, Veritas
Cluster, etc.  
• Scripting skills with any of the following languages (Ksh, Bash, Perl,
Python)  
• Experience with the following will be considered as advantage:
virtualization concepts and technologies (XEN, KVM, Oracle VM, Solaris zones,
LPAR/VPAR, HP-UX IVM, etc.), server hardware specifics and troubleshooting,
storage and networking, backup and database environments, system security
administration, ITIL  
  
  
Qualifications & Skills:  
• Bachelor’s / Master’s degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering,
Information Management or relevant experience  
• Strong English language skills  
  
We offer a challenging role including:

of the art enterprise environments, providing services to variety of world-

the Unix/Linux field

technologies

Creative Department in order to provide great vision for our brands.  
  
WHAT WE EXPECT FROM THE CANDIDATES:  
  
To be considered for this position you must be an experienced Front-End
Developer with the following skills:  
  
\- Proficiency in HTML and CSS;  
\- Very Good understanding of JavaScript;  
\- Experience with responsive web design;  
\- Basic knowledge in PHP;  
\- Great attention to detail and be highly organized.  
  
  
WHAT WE OFFER:  
  
\- An excellent working environment;  
\- A young and friendly team to work with;  
\- A challenging job that requires a variety of skills and good self-
confidence.  
  
  
To apply for this position, please send your CV along with URLs/examples of
your previous work, to Human Resources Office  
Only the approved candidates will be contacted.  
  
All applications will be treated in confidence.

title: French Technical Support Representative
description:
|  THE EXPERIENCE MATTERS  
  
C3i Healthcare Connections, a division of Telerx, is an American company,
leading provider of technical support services for life sciences companies
worldwide. We operate in the field of Information technologies (IT) and their
application for the needs of the Pharmaceutical industry and clinical research
organizations. Since we had opened the office in Sofia, Bulgaria in 2005, we
managed to attract many talented and motivated people and helped them develop
their potential. To ensure the expansion of the company we are now planning to
open an office in Varna.  
  
The TECHNICAL SUPPORT REPRESENTATIVE will help customers (sales force and
office-based users) by providing resolution of technical and network problems
with hardware and peripherals – laptops, tablets, printers, mobile phones,
routers, in a friendly, professional manner over the phone and via email.  
  
The main responsibilities of the role include, but are not limited to:  
• resolving username and password problems  
• diagnose and resolve technical hardware and software issues  
• uninstalling, reinstalling software applications  
• verifying proper hardware and software set up  
• assisting with navigating around application menus  
• troubleshooting email issues  
  
Support will be provided in adherence to high company standards for quality,
accuracy, thoroughness, timeliness and consistency in customer care.  
  
Job requirements:  
• Advanced verbal and written skills in French- minimum C1 according to the
CEFR*  
• Upper-intermediate verbal and written skills in English - minimum B2
according to the CEFR*  
• Interest and/or experience in IT as an end-user  
• Willingness to learn and obtain new skills and competencies  
• Excellent interpersonal and communications skills  
• Availability to work on shifts  
• Ethics, Team work and Positive attitude  
• High school diploma  
  
What we offer:  
• Professional on-boarding and on-going trainings  
• Opportunity to practice your foreign language skills and develop your
technical expertise  
• Opportunity for career progression with leading US Company  
• Competitive salary and performance bonuses  
• Social benefits package  
• Possibility to combine work and study  
• Vibrant environment  
  
Are you willing to build up your career with us? - We’ll be happy to receive
your resume in English!  
  
Your personal data is secure with us.  
  
*The Common European Framework of Reference for Languages  
** Only candidates selected for interview will be contacted

title: System Administrator
description:
|  Requirements:  
  
At least 2 years of work-related experience.  
Experience in administration of Windows server systems, basic understanding of
Active Directory.  
Basic knowledge of networking and PC architecture, experience with setting up
and tuning hardware (laying and maintaining structured cables, assembling and
repairing PCs, diagnosing and maintaining the equipment).  
Practical experience working with the corporate antivirus systems.  
Spoken English.  
  
Additional Requirements:  
  
Experience working on helpdesk (service desk) and user support.  
Experience working with Linux.  
  
Responsibilities:  
  
User support and desktop operating system/application support.  
Maintenance of office structured cabling.  
Technical maintenance of computer systems and office equipment.  
Help support the Active Directory, Windows, and Linuх servers.

title: Senior .NET Developer
description:
|  Requirements:  
  
Knowledge and experience working with C#, including the latest versions of
ASP.NET MVC framework.  
Experience in the software design.  
Experience in object-oriented programming (OOP), object-oriented design (OOD),
and design patterns.  
At least 3 years of experience in development of commercial applications using
.NET platform.  
Knowledge of JavaScript and JavaScript frameworks (jQuery, Angular.js,
Backbone.js).  
Experienced team worker.  
Spoken English.  
Additional Requirements  
  
Experience working with MS SQL Server database management system and its
components (SSRS, SSIS).  
Experience using test-driven development (TDD).  
Experience working with foreign clients.  
Knowledge of Agile development methodology and experience in teamwork using
Scrum.  
Microsoft certificates.

title: PHP програмист
description:
|  Магазин Диверсант е един от водещите брандове в шпионския бранш. Във връзка
с излизането на международния пазар:  
  
**Компанията търси да назначи:** PHP програмист  
  
**Свободни позиции:** 2  
  
**Нашите изисквания към Вас:  
**  
\- Много добри познания и владеене на PHP  
\- Добри познания по JavaScript  
\- Базови познания по Ruby on Rails  
\- Опит в рабoта с бази данни - MySQL  
\- Умение за работа в екип  
\- Добро владеене на английски език  
  
**Предимства са:  
**  
\- Писане на сигурен софтуер и познаване на стандартните грешки по отношение
на сигурността при програмирането  
\- Опит с OpenCart  
\- Опит с администриране на Linux/FreeBSD  
\- Опит в разработването на интезивно натоварени услуги  
\- Разбиране и владеене на релационните бази данни, дизайн на бази данни,
нормализация, оптимизиране.  
  
**Компанията предлага:  
**  
\- Възнаграждение според уменията и опита на кандидата  
\- Обезпечаване на разходите за курсове свързане с повишаване на
квалификацията  
\- Бонуси  
\- Перфектна среда за работа  
\- Възможност за развитие  
  
**Необходими документи:  
**  
\- CV  
\- Portfolio  
  
Кандидатури неотговарящи на изискванията няма да бъдат разглеждани  
Избраните кандидати ще бъдат поканени на интервю

title: Senior QA Engineer
description:
|  Requirements:  
  
3 years experience of software testing  
Knowledge of testing basics (test types and methods of organizing them in the
process of testing different kinds of applications, skills of test
documentation, test cases, and so on.)  
Good spoken English  
Additional Requirements:  
  
Experience in automated testing, and the ability to work with automation tools
(Selenium, TestComplete, QTP, etc.)  
Knowledge and skills in the field of programming (OOP, knowledge of
programming languages + SQL, HTML, etc.).  
Knowledge of database fundamentals and skills to work with the database
(MSSQL, Oracle, MySQL, PostreSQL, etc.)  
Team management abilities  
The ability to learn and master new technologies

title: Senior Java Developer
description:
|  Requirements:  
  
Excellent knowledge of Java.  
Experience in development of applications using Java Enterprise platform.  
Experience working with databases (SQL and NoSQL).  
Experience in object-oriented programming (OOP), object-oriented design (OOD),
and design patterns.  
Experience using test-driven development (TDD).  
At least 3 years of experience in development of web applications.  
Experience using object-relational mapping (ORM), EJB and IoC containers.  
Experience working with Spring MVC, JavaScript, and JavaScript frameworks
(jQuery).  
Knowledge of project management tools (Ant or Maven).  
Experienced team worker.  
Spoken English.  
Additional Requirements:  
  
Knowledge of JavaScript frameworks (Angular.js, Backbone.js, Bootstrap).  
Experience creating rich user interfaces (UI) based on HTML.  
Experience with installation and administration of application servers
(Tomcat, JBoss, GlassFish).  
Experience using Continuous Integration systems (TeamCity, Bamboo, Hudson).

title: Senior AngularJS Developer / Front-end
description:
|  Requirements:  
  
At least 3 years of experience working with web technologies.  
Good knowledge of JavaScript.  
Experience working with JavaScript MVC/MVVM frameworks and libraries
(AngularJS, Backbone.js, jQuery, Bootstrap).  
Good knowledge of related technologies: HTML, HTML5, CSS.  
Experience working with object-oriented programming (OOP) in JavaScript.  
Spoken English.  
Additional Requirements:  
  
Knowledge of the WebSocket protocol.  
Experience working with Sencha ExtJS library and jQueryMobile framework.  
Experience working with PhoneGap framework and touch devices.  
Experience working with CSS frameworks (SASS/LESS, Twitter Bootstrap,
Foundation

title: PHP DEVELOPER
description:
|

Rax-Media is looking for a talented **PHP developer**.  
  
Rax Media LTD. is a global service provider to an online trading platform,
offering Index trading, Forex trading, as well as Commodities and Stocks
trading. We are looking for talented individuals to join our team.  
  
If you are passionate and you want to make something exciting and meaningful  
  
• • • we are looking for you • • •  
  
** Our requirements:**  
  
• Excellent knowledge in PHP  
  
• Good knowledge in MySQL, PostgreSQL  
  
• Good knowledge in JavaScript, jQuery  
  
• Good knowledge in HTML and CSS  
  
• Linux experience  
  
• At least 2 years experience in web development.  
  
• Programming languages - PHP, Javascript, XML, Json, HTML5, CSS, CSS3,
jQuery, API's  
Relational database such as MySQL, PostgreSQL and a good working knowledge of
SQL.  
  
  
** The following would be considered an advantage:**

  
• Experience with modern PHP frameworks like CodeIgniter, Laravel.  
• Experience with automation testing.  
• Experience with version control systems.  
  
  
**What we offer:**  
  
• Very attractive remuneration package;  
• Full social package plus additional health insurance;  
• Being a part of a fast developing company;  
• Opportunities for career progression.  
  
  
**If you see yourself as a part of our team, Please send your CV only in English with a recent picture.  
**It will be very much appreciated if you provide us with some links to check out a few projects of your portfolio.  
  
All documents will be treated in strict confidentiality.  
Short-listed candidates will be invited for an interview.

title: Experienced PHP Developer
description:
|  A small but busy and creative web agency with a diverse portfolio spanning
hybrid app development, custom integrated software solutions and website
development for clients based in the EU and US is looking for an experienced /
senior developer with a strong work ethos, team-player attitude and a good
sense of software development process.  
  
The new team member will feel comfortable blending into a small set-up with an
established flow of task and project management, code and peer reviews,
Gitflow and deployment process but also confident and experienced enough to
work with the CTO and Senior PM towards optimizing and improving the workflow.  
  
This is a great opportunity for an outgoing and confident individual to assume
responsibility and contribute to both the team development and the long-term
goals of an ambitious software firm – and be rewarded for it.  
  
The ideal candidate has strong experience in PHP, MySql, JavaScript, HTML,
XHTML and CSS and is able to learn quickly and master diverse technologies and
development techniques. Attention to detail and drive for perfection go
without saying.  
  
Required Skills  
  
• 2+ years of verifiable experience in developing and architecting Web
Solutions. Profound knowledge of PHP/Python, MySql, Javascript , HTML/CSS and
version control systems is a must.  
• Proper knowledge and experience administering LAMP (Linux, Apache, MySql,
PHP)  
• Able to work independently as well as in a team;  
• Good command of English  
• Dependable, diligent and respectful of deadlines  
  
Experience with one or more of the following a huge advantage:  
  
• Hybrid app development  
• Sencha Touch  
• Ionic SDK  
• Python  
• Drupal  
  
To apply  
• Resume  
  
  
Interested? You’re most welcome to apply. Please send a CV and a short, but
meaningful, motivation letter.

title: Програмист / Open Source Developer
description:
|  В SkadIT разработваме уеб и cloud-базирани софтуерни решения и интегрирани
системи, Drupal уебсайтове и хибридни приложения. Разширяваме дейността си и
ни е нужен Open Source програмист, който да подсили екипа. Нашата мисия е да
доставяме професионални услуги и качествени решения на своите клиенти, сред
които има водещи глобални брандове. Вижте повече за нас и нашите клиенти на
сайта ни.  
  
Инвестираме в екип от добри специалисти, които имат свободата да прилагат
знанията си, да бъдат креативни и да развиват себе си и продуктите на
компанията – и да бъдат подобаващо възнаградени за това.  
  
Познаваме и прилагаме най-добрите практики в управлението на проекти и
вярваме, че процесите ни за разработка и комуникация, и системите ни за
разпределение на задачите и контрол на качеството, създават сигурна и приятна
среда за развитието на всеки, който би се определил като отборен играч.
Успешният кандидат има визия и желание да допринася за постоянното развитие на
работния процес, и искрен стремеж нещата да бъдат създавани правилно от самото
начало.  
  
Изисквания:  
  
\- 2+ години опит в работа и проектиране на Open Source Web applications:
PHP/Python, MySql, Javascript , HTML/CSS и опит с version control systems.  
\- Познания по администриране и работа с LAMP пакета (Linux / Apache / MySql /
PHP).  
\- Разбиране на основите в разработката на уеб приложения.  
\- работен английски.  
  
Предимства:  
\- Искрен интерес, мотивация и желание за работа в силен екип за разработка на
качествени Open Source приложения.  
\- Интерес и мотивация да се включва активно в планирането и изпълнението на
поставените задачи, за да може тимът му да се развива и постига целите си.  
\- Проактивност по отношение на възникналите проблеми и способност да намира
решения на базата на собствения си опит и разбиране за правилен процес.  
\- Доказан опит и познания за добрите практики в agile development, code and
peer reviews, Gitflow и deployment process.  
\- Опит в поне едно от следните е огромно предимство:  
• Hybrid app development  
• Sencha Touch  
• Ionic SDK  
• Python  
• Drupal  
  
Ние предлагаме:  
  
\- Възможност за реализиране на идеите на кандидата за изграждане на екип и
процес. Свобода да прилагате знанията си и принос, който ще бъде оценен.  
\- Работа с доказани специалисти в областта на Open Source приложенията,
предлагаща широко поле за собствено развитие и усъвършенстване  
\- Безценен опит в разработката на уеб приложения и възможност да сте част от
процеса и дългосрочните планове за развитие на амбициозна IT компания.

title: СПЕЦИАЛИСТ ПОДДРЪЖКА НА ИТ ИНФРАСТРУКТУРА
Tivoli (TSM) Professional
description:
|  We live in a moment of remarkable change and opportunity. Data and
technology are transforming industries, society, and even the workplace—by
creating professions that didn’t exist before the emergence of data, cloud,
social and mobile.  
  
At IBM, you’ll collaborate with extraordinary professionals in a creative
environment to make the world work better.  
This role specializes in performing and enabling remote technical support of
IBM software and solutions.  
  
**Responsibilities of this role include but are not limited to:**  
  

  * Provide technical support assistance to customers using problem determination/problem source identification skills.

**

IBM is committed to creating a diverse environment and is proud to be an equal
opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for

title: (Senior) Developer XS Integration Team Job
description:
|  As market leader in enterprise application software, SAP helps companies of
all sizes and industries innovate through simplification. From the back office
to the boardroom, warehouse to storefront, on premise to cloud, desktop to
mobile device – SAP empowers people and organizations to work together more
efficiently and use business insight more effectively to stay ahead of the
competition. SAP applications and services enable customers to operate
profitably, adapt continuously, and grow sustainably.  
  
PURPOSE AND OBJECTIVES  
  
SAP HANA is a revolutionary market-leading in-memory database and application
platform. It utilizes cutting-edge in-memory computing technologies made
possible through recent advances in main memory, multi-core processing and
data management. SAP HANA leverages technology innovation to enable real-time
analysis of Big Data. Optimized for both transactional and analytical
processing, SAP HANA brings a dramatic increase in performance of
applications.  
  
Being much beyond a next-generation database, SAP HANA also enables end-to-end
application development via its Extended Application Services – so you can
build web-based applications that communicate with SAP HANA. The platform
provides standard Java and  
  
Node.js application runtimes, and is built substantially on open-source
projects.  
  
We are looking for a Senior Software Engineer to join us in inventing and
delivering a state-of-the-art Continuos Delivery Infrastructure and Framework
for SAP HANA XS that will guarantee quality without compromises for both cloud
and on-premise app developers.  
  
  
EXPECTATIONS AND TASKS  
  
You will be working in a cross-functional team, following agile methodologies
and industry best practices. As part of the team you will:  
  
Design, develop and deliver new software with clean code. This includes
defining and reviewing architecture, prototyping, creating automated tests and
technical documentation  
Perform code reviews and have your code reviewed by other team members  
Cooperate tightly with other development groups from different locations  
Do functional, performance and scalability testing, analyze results and drive
optimizations with affected teams  
Help porting applications which run on standalone Tomcat,TomEE or Node.js to a
microservices runtime based on Cloud Foundry.  
Constantly acquire new knowledge and skills and put them into practice  
  
  
WHAT WE OFFER  
  
A unique opportunity to become part of the #1 enterprise software vendor  
Broad expertise and cutting-edge product knowledge  
Professional working environment in a team of highly motivated experts  
Wide exposure to international projects  
Competitive benefits package  
  
EDUCATION AND QUALIFICATIONS / SKILLS AND COMPETENCIES  
  
Proactive problem-solving attitude  
Excellent programming skills in Java  
Excellent understanding of OOP, data structures, algorithms and design
patterns  
Strong communication and negotiation skills  
Fluency in English  
Highly dependable, self-reliant and teamwork-oriented individual  
Willingness to learn new technologies  
  
  
EXPERIENCE WITH ANY OF THE FOLLOWING IS AN ADVANTAGE  
  
Strong knowledge of Java and Java EE internals including class loading, memory
management, and transaction management  
Web and application servers (Tomcat, TomEE, SAP WebAS Java, JBoss, Glassfish,
Node.js etc.)  
Web development (HTTP protocol, HTML5, JavaScript, Struts, Spring,
JSP/Servlets/JSTL etc.)  
Cloud Foundry, Docker  
RDBMS and JDBC  
Versioning and revision control systems (git, github, perforce)  
Continuous Integration (Maven, JUnit, Ant, Jenkins)  
Design and analysis of N-tiered applications, with multi-tier architecture and
production Internet architectures.  
Operating Systems (Linux, Windows, OS X)  
Virtualization infrastructure  
Scripting languages (Ruby, Perl, Shell scripting)  
HANA  
  
  
SAP'S DIVERSITY COMMITMENT  
  
To harness the power of innovation, SAP invests in the development of its
diverse employees. We aspire to leverage the qualities and appreciate the
unique competencies that each person brings to the company.  
  
  
SAP is committed to the principles of Equal Employment Opportunity and to
providing reasonable accommodations to applicants with physical and/or mental
disabilities. If you are interested in applying for employment with SAP and
are in need of accommodation or special assistance to navigate our website or
to complete your application, please send online your request to Recruiting
Operations team. Requests for reasonable accommodation will be considered on a
case-by-case basis.

title: WEB FRONT-END DEVELOPER - GRAPHIC DESIGNER BACKGROUND
description:
|

**OVERVIEW**  
  
**Zertios LTD:  
**Our startup was founded in 2014 managing the website migrations of a family of web hosting companies in Belgium. Since then we have gradually expanded our expertise. Currently Zertios is working as a micro-scale service centre for tens of thousands of customers with more than 100 000 websites, providing solutions for system monitoring, support, web development, digital marketing and looking to add more… 

**The job:**  
As a Web Developer/Graphic designer you will be involved in the design of
different visuals for our customer’s corporate website and its brands. You
will be working in the web development team managing a portfolio of different
hosting brands with multiple transactions every month. You will help improve
and maintain the online image and marketability of the company and its
products with various smart design solutions – while keeping in line with its
current vision.

You will work independently as a distant team member, but you will be strongly
engaged in internal projects (various websites, promos, temporary campaign
sites, ...) You will be involved from the briefing until the final result.

You get the opportunity to put forward your ideas and go through with them
from the concept to the realization. We offer you the necessary space for
participation, organization and involvement.  
  
**The training:**  
The training starts as soon as you sign your labor contract, which means you
are already on the company payroll. We expect the applicants to have design
background and some experience with web design projects. Zertios will then
offer you subject-specific training by our experienced team leads to further
your web development skills in our Sofia office for between 2 and 3 weeks.

Learning at Zertios is a continuous process. After you step into the position
you can expect to be encouraged and supported by the company to develop and
expand your knowledge through various channels.  
  
**The office:**  
After the end of the training the graphic designers will continue work from
our Sofia office, as a distant team member to the Belgian team. Location is in
the perfect centre. Refreshments are on us.  
  
**REQUIRED SKILLS**

**Design skills:**

  * You have a webdesign background and can prove it with a beautiful portfolio
  * You are mainly interested to further develop your career in front-end development.
  * Excellent command of Adobe products: 
    * Photoshop
    * Illustrator
    * InDesign

**Web design skills:**

  * Good knowledge of HTML, CSS is a must
  * Knowledge of Bootstrap is a must
  * Knowledge of jQuery is a must
  * Basic knowledge of Symfony is a plus
  * Basic knowledge of Linux commands is a plus
  * Basic knowledge of Composer is a plus
  * Basic knowledge of Grunt is a plus
  * Basic knowledge of Bower is a plus
  * Basic awareness of online marketing and SEO is a plus

**Language skills:**

  * Excellent verbal skills in English are a must

**Personal skills:**

  * Reliable and loyal
  * Responsible
  * Flexible
  * Independent 
  * Self-improvement
  * Excellent communication skills
  * Efficient communication with different remote technical teams

**WHAT YOU WILL DO**

  * Your first task will be to get familiar with look and feel of the brands you will manage.
  * Designing and maintaining projects on our customer’s corporate website and its various brands
  * Create designs of pages with the look and feel of the Brand
  * Code the designs online
  * Improve existing pages to be more in line with brand design
  * Banners and images for commercial campaigns
  * E-book/Whitepaper design

**WHAT TO EXPECT **

  * On our 1st interview we will talk about your experience. We will assess your skills in English. We will discuss your portfolio.
  * On our 2nd interview we do a test to examine your skills.
  * On our 3rd interview you will get to meet the client you will be working for.

**WHAT WE DO FOR YOU**

  * Paid training
  * Cool office location in the very center of Sofia
  * Free energy boost – tea, coffee, fresh fruit
  * Competitive salary
  * Social benefits
  * Career future

_  
ALL APPLICANTS MUST SUBMIT A URL TO AN ONLINE PORTFOLIO _

___If you think you fit the profile, please do not hesitate to apply. We will
be glad to meet you in person!_

title: LabView Software Specialist
description:
