infrastructures.  
• Experience and in-depth understanding of high traffic, load intensive web
projects.  
  
Main benefits of the job position:  
• Open-minded and friendly stress-free working environment  
• Global marketing exposure  
• Freedom to test, iterate and optimize  
• Fast growing company in a dynamic competitive online industry  
• Opportunity for personal and professional growth

title: ERP Consultant
description:
|

**Forza Consulting** is a company specialized in services related to Oracle business applications. Forza stands for Expertise and Knowledge. We deliver high quality consultancy services and have been successful in providing solutions that best fit the needs of our customers. Forza Consulting has over a decade of experience in Oracle software and our team has a reputation of being true experts in all Oracle ERP related fields. Forza focuses on customers in Europe and has offices in Sofia, Bulgaria and near Amsterdam, The Netherlands.  
  
For our Sofia office we are looking for candidates for the role of **ERP
Consultant**.  
  
**Job Profile****  
**  
As an ERP Consultant you will be responsible for the implementation of Oracle
Business Applications for customers in different European countries. The
length of the projects may vary from 2 to 18 months. Your responsibilities
include:  
• Prepare product presentations and demonstrations.  
• Gather customer requirements and transform business processes in optimized
business flows.  
• Prepare project documentation including functional and/or high level
technical design for modifications and customizations.  
• Configure the business applications in the scope of the project.  
• Prepare and execute test scenarios.  
• Prepare end-user training.  
• Customer support.

  
You will be the ideal candidate if you match the following requirements:  
  
**Background:**  
• Bachelor or Master’s Degree preferably in Management Information Systems/
IT/ Management programmes.  
• 3 to 5 years working experience.  
  
**Skills:**  
• Fluency in English; good command of Russian/ French/ German is a plus.  
• Good consulting/ soft skills.  
• Knowledge in ERP applications in the field of Finance/ Logistics/
Manufacturing; experience with Oracle EBS would be considered a plus.  
• Good knowledge of business processes.  
• Excellent computer literacy.  
• Experience in extending standard product functionality is a plus.  
  
**Personality:**  
• Team player;  
• Excellent interpersonal skills;  
• A proactive problem solving approach;  
• Strong analytic view combined with pragmatic attitude (flexibility);  
• Ability to prioritize and manage work to project timelines;  
• Open to travelling.  
  
**What Forza Consulting will offer:**  
  
• Flexible working hours;  
• 25 days paid vacation and work-life balance;  
• Competitive remuneration plus bonuses depending on personal achievements and
contribution;  
• Extensive internal and external training to support your professional
growth;  
• Friendly working environment in a team of dedicated and experienced
enterprise software specialists.  
  
If you are interested in the offer we have and you think that you can meet
this challenge – please send your CV in English and a short motivation letter.  
  
Only short-listed candidates will be contacted.

title: Analyst, Technical Support
description:
|  Our office in Sofia is a key part of the Hostway organization, both in
continuing our global expansion and in our dedication to providing
unparalleled technical support. We want **YOU** to become a part of our
international family for the position of **Analyst, Technical Support.**  
  
**POSITION PURPOSE:**   
Provide world class technical support to Hostway Web Hosting customers,
exceeding customer expectations in a considerate and efficient manner.  
  
**OUR IDEAL CANDIDATE:**  

  * Is fluent in English.
  * Is willing to work flexible shifts that include day, night and weekend hours.
  * Is passionate about the web hosting industry and has experience with building/maintaining websites.
  * Is willing to learn, improve and work efficiently in a team according to performance requirements and standards set by the company.

  
**YOUR JOB DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES:**  

  * Responsible for taking inbound calls from existing Hostway customers to answer technical questions regarding Web hosting, Email, Domain names and other Internet applications and services.
  * Communicate with customers to determine root cause of issues and provide recommendations and direction for successful resolution.
  * Take ownership of customer concerns and issues and ensure timely resolution.
  * Eliminate customer confusion or frustration using empathy and consideration to reach amicable solutions.

  
**OUR REQUIREMENTS**:  

  * Must be fluent in the English language both verbally and written
  * Must be available to work flexible shifts that include day, night and weekend hours.
  * Previous Call Center experience preferred.
  * Must be well organized and detail-oriented and have excellent interpersonal skills.
  * Ability to troubleshoot email programs, such as but not limited to Outlook, Outlook Express, Eudora, among others.
  * Experience using HTML editors (FrontPage or Dreamweaver for example) and other internet based applications.
  * Working knowledge in a Windows and / or Mac based environment. Basic UNIX and / or Linux are preferred, not required.
  * Must have a high school diploma or equivalent.

  
**WHAT WE OFFER:**  

  * An attractive remuneration package!
  * 25 days of annual paid leave! 
  * Constant extensive trainings!
  * Work with an enthusiastic team of professionals!
  * Opportunity to work in an international and culturally diverse environment!
  * Opportunity for career development in an IT oriented international company!

  
**If you’re interested in applying for this position please send us a short cover letter and your CV in English. Hostway thanks all candidates for their interest; however, only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.**

title: Senior .Net Developer
description:
|

**Internet Securities Bulgaria Ltd**. was founded in 1997 in Sofia, Bulgaria. The company is part of **Euromoney Institutional Investor PLC**, a part of **Daily Mail & General Trust group (DMGT)** – one of the largest media companies in the United Kingdom. The company delivers hard-to-get information products covering more than 100 developed and emerging markets to institutional customers around the world on subscription basis. The Sofia office has grown to be the biggest office for the group, hiring highly educated professionals who develop and support our main products, focused on delivering news, company, industry, financial, legal and macroeconomic information on emerging and developed markets around the world. Our clients include top investment banks, corporations, law firms, consultants, investment and insurance companies, universities and libraries, multilateral organizations, and others.****  
  
**CEIC Data**, provides high quality macroeconomic databases and has built its reputation in the financial information service industry on accuracy, service and comprehensiveness.

**CEIC Data** implements meticulous measures to ensure accuracy and completeness of our data. We build databases in response to extensive market study by our data specialists and researchers. We cultivate and leverage relationships and direct data distribution arrangements with the prime national and regional data sources and major industrial data issuing organizations of each country covered. CEIC has a coverage of more than 120 countries, supported by analysts around the globe.

**Internet Securities Bulgaria Ltd**. currently has an opening in its CEIC Data team based in Bulgaria. 

**   
SENIOR .NET DEVELOPER **  
  

**Responsibilities:**

  * Designs, modifies, develops, writes and implements software programming applications with .NET 3.5 and 4.0 / VB.NET / C# / Framework 3.5 and 4.5 / MySQL
  * Facilitates entire development life cycle including analysis, design, testing and implementation
  * Create, maintain and develop documentation
  * Ability to independently research and troubleshoot problems
  * Participate in a small, experienced, energetic team on a rapid, agile development schedule
  * Work with the local and overseas team to establish and deliver on time
  * All other responsibilities as assigned

**Requirements:**

  * A Bachelor's degree in Information Systems, Information Technology or Computer Science
  * General professional experience - 5+ years
  * 5+ years experience as a developer with C# / VB.NET 
  * 3+ years experience working with MySQL and T-SQL. Knowledge on MSSQL
  * Advanced C++ skills for special projects inside the solution
  * People management experience
  * Strong knowledge of software implementation best practices
  * Strong experience designing and working with n-tier architectures (UI, Business Logic Layer, Data Access Layer) along with some experience with service-oriented architectures (SOA).
  * Passionate about building high-quality systems with software implementation best practices.
  * Ability to quickly assimilate new technologies and skills
  * Very good command of English and MS Office

**  
What we offer:**

  * Full time job
  * Excellent working environment in an international company
  * Excellent remuneration package
  * Great enhancement of your technical expertise and skills
  * Ability to work and collaborate, share knowledge and experience with many professionals globally

**How to apply:**

If you are looking for the different opportunity, together with interesting
and challenging projects, please, do not hesitate to send your CV in English.
All job applicants will be treated with strict confidentiality. Only short-
listed candidates will be contacted.

title: Team Leader
Associate Network Support Specialist – Tier 1 with German
description:
|  IBM Technical Support Services’ (TSS) mission is to become the largest and
most successful provider of technical support services in the world. The
Client Innovation Center in Sofia, Bulgaria is building a trans-disciplinary
team of network support specialists tasked with supporting our clients in any
country worldwide.  
  
The Associate Network Support Specialist - Tier 1 is a Customer Service
Engineer role that is a member of a technical team who’s responsible for
owning and resolving support requests raised by customers. The team includes
mostly engineers with dual language proficiency (English plus one additional
language). Additional language required: German.  
  
** Main Responsibilities:**  
  
Initial point of contact for resolving customer questions and issues related
to Cisco networking products.  
Support is delivered via the phone, chat or web service requests.  
Collaborate with other team members on a daily basis in order to achieve a
satisfactory resolution to customer issues  
Provide answers for general usage and operation questions related to Cisco
networking equipment  
Provide problem determination / problem source identification for known and
published problems  
Work within a fast paced environment while achieving high levels of accuracy
with the information provided by the customer  
Demonstrate excellent English skills in both oral and written communications,
plus proficiency in German.  
Follow Support Center processes for effective management of all assigned
support incidents  
This position will require ongoing skills development activities and
successful completion of all required training curriculum  
Support Center operational hours: 8AM – 8PM EEST Monday – Friday (incl
holidays)  
  
**Required:  
**  
**Knowledge / Skill and Expertise**  
  
At least 6 months of experience in related customer support  
Experience in a technical support role is a plus  
Basic understanding of IT networking ie wireless, routing, switching,
firewalls  
Experience with Microsoft Operating systems at advanced user level  
Experience with Microsoft Office ( Word, Outlook) at advanced user level  
Bachelor's Degree (or equivalent) in Engineering or similar technical field  
Ability to communicate in English, both spoken and written at B2-C2 level,
plus additional fluent required language: German  
Basic understanding of networking - TCP/IP, routing, switching, firewalls  
  
** Soft Competencies**  
  
Excellent communication skills  
Excellent organizational skills  
Good analytical and problem solving skills  
Ability to work within a team  
Ability to produce good documentation  
Focused & Results orientated  
  
  
** Additional information**  
  
+CCNA or equivalent Cisco certification is a plus  
+Technical Support experience is a plus  
  
_IBM is committed to creating a diverse environment and is proud to be an
equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive
consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender,
gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics,
disability, age, or veteran status. IBM is also committed to compliance with
all fair employment practices regarding citizenship and immigration status._

title: Java Full Stack Engineer (eXtreme Programming)
description:
|

Acavva OOD is an authorized partner of HedgeServ Corp. in Bulgaria. Acavva OOD
is hiring under labor contract Senior Java and Web Developers to expand their
distributed team in Sofia.

• **HedgeServ Corp.** \- Company Abstract

We are U.S. based hedge fund administration company with offices in New York,
Chicago, Boston, Dublin, London, Sydney, Luxembourg, Grand Cayman and Sofia.

• **Job Description**

You will be a member of a **highly-skilled**,** motivated** and **fun**
distributed **agile team**, with business analysts in Dublin, software
development and QA in New York and Sofia.

⦿ Expect **excellent salary** package: **3000** \- **6000** (Leva Net)

⦿ Working environment where **individuality**, **creativity**,
**craftsmanship** and **culture matter**!

⦿ We focus on **Agile practices** **and values**

⦿ **eXtreme Programming** in particular.

⦿ We are NOT an outsourcing shop, we develop our own products.

• **Knowledge and desired experience **(attitude, personality and intelligence
can substitute for some):

⦿ **Java** \- 5 years, with a focus on middle layer or back end.

⦿ **Spring**.

⦿ **Hibernate**, Experience with **SQL**.

⦿ **JavaScript**, experience with some of the popular **JS Frameworks** a
plus.

⦿ You should be able to manipulate **HTML5** and **CSS3** to your will.

⦿ **Git**, **Gradle**, Eclipse, IntelliJ IDEA, Ant, Subversion.

⦿ Excellent communication and interpersonal skills. **Team player!**

⦿ **Excellent level of English** (oral and written) is a must.

⦿ Willingness to **learn new technologies** is essential.  
  
⦿ Experience with **Agile Development** a plus.  

⦿ Experience with UI testing frameworks, such as Selenium, Sahi a plus.

⦿ Pro-active, enthusiastic and dedicated.

• **Practices we use **(we expect to evolve and add to them as we constantly
learn and grow):

⦿ **TDD** (Test-Driven Development) techniques.

⦿ **CI / CD** using Team City, Jenkins.

⦿ **Automated Unit and Acceptance Tests**.

⦿ **Daily Stand-up Meetings**: 5 - 5:30pm.

⦿ **Pair programming** (most of the time).

⦿ **Short iteration** with **frequent production releases**.

• **You will**:

⦿ Work in a small team, but have the support of a large global organization.

⦿ Have stability that a startup cannot provide, but enjoy startup-like
environment.

⦿ Learn that there is more to being a successful developer than just being
able to win a late night hackathon.

⦿ Learn not just how to write elegant code, but how to deliver that code, and
how to get it into production.

⦿ Work in a culture that rewards results.

⦿ Learn how to balance development speed against operational stability.

⦿ Be free to make many of your own decisions.

⦿ Should believe that web development is a craft that demands you to practice
and learn from others.

⦿ **Become a better craftsman!**
